Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Red Rupee#.
